alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Kearney; Phelps; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 12:59AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Phelps, northwestern Kearney, Buffalo, southern Sherman and eastern Dawson Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1259 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Sumner, or 10 miles northeast of Lexington, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sumner around 110 AM CDT. Miller around 115 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Amherst, Riverdale and Kearney. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 233 and 281. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
